Title: Object: Arise, and take the Young Child, and his Mother, and Flee into Egypt
Description: The Holy Family resting during the Flight into Egypt; St Joseph standing beside the donkey, drawing his cloak around him, the Virgin laying the infant Jesus on a rock, holding the edge of His garment in right hand, gesturing with the other, two cherubs standing together and watching to left; after Murillo. 1792 Mezzotint
Bibliographic references: Chaloner Smith 1883 / British Mezzotinto portraits from the introduction of the art to the early part of the present century (undescribed)
Cross 1993 / Engraved in the memory: James Walker, engraver to the Empress Catherine the Great, and his Russian anecdotes (48)
